Summary: Same report--trying to upload video converted from blu-ray to mpg 2 file.
divs: sighting detailshope this upload works--been having strange computer problems since this happened. mouse\cursor moving on its own (on a mac and a pc), freezing, wrong text count on comment posts, text while typing jumping lines, etc. cell phones dropping calls. warning on security system saying battery failure --which then 'resolved' itself somehow... the time showing on the video information file is wrong too. the morning after the 5\18 orange ufo sighting the presets on car stereo were wiped out like the battery had gone dead (it wasn't dead or even low)--funny sounds during 'ring' on cell phone call made during sighting on 5\18 that never connected (except to voicemail eventually). reports of gps problems last week reported on local news. alot of dropped cell phone calls not usually associated with verizon around here. extra slow cable internet service too.
